messages.zh: 第八关（前）
messages.en: level 8(pre)

messages.zh: 没时间从其他区域绕行了......
messages.en: No time to take a detour……

messages.zh: 必须直接穿过<color=#ee4321>下城区</color>。
messages.en: We have to go through lower downtown directly.

messages.zh: 需要各小队分别行动吗？
messages.en: Should we let the squads split up?

messages.zh: 万一被各个击破就麻烦了。
messages.en: It’d be bad if they’re taken out one by one.

messages.zh: 以我们现在的规模，团队行动难免会被发觉。
messages.en: With our current sizes, it’d be hard to pass by unnoticed.

messages.zh: 在狭窄的街巷中行动，很容易被埋伏包夹......
messages.en: Moving through the narrow alleys, would easily get us ambushed and surrounded……

messages.zh: 怎么办？
messages.en: What should we to?

messages.zh: 提出正面突破的战术
messages.en: Propose a frontal breakthrough tactic

messages.zh: 值得赞赏。
messages.en: Commendable.

messages.zh: 就该这样。猛烈冲击，搅乱阵形，破坏火力点，迅速撤退，理所应当。
messages.en: That’s what it should be like. Charge fiercely, wreck their formation, destroy their firepower, retreat swiftly, as it should be.

messages.zh: ......不错。肉眼可见的威胁远比进退两难容易处理的多。
messages.en: ……Not bad. Threats that the naked eye can see are far easier to deal with than dilemmas.

messages.zh: 我可以把这个看作是{@nickname}博士的命令吗，阿米娅？
messages.en: Can I regard this as Dr.___’s order, Amiya?

messages.zh: 局势还是比较明了的。我赞成博士的选择。
messages.en: The situation’s pretty clear now. I agree with Doctor’s choice.

messages.zh: 那如果是比较困难的抉择——
messages.en: Then when it comes to harder choices——

messages.zh: 要求大家现在就完全信赖博士，确实还太早了。
messages.en: Asking everyone to trust Doctor completely, is still too early now indeed.

messages.zh: 但只要一同战斗上一段时间，我相信，各位都会承认博士的能力的。
messages.en: But after fighting together for a while, I believe, everyone will recognize Doctor’s capabilities.

messages.zh: 你这么说的话，我同意。
messages.en: If that’s what you say, I agree.

messages.zh: 当然，从个人角度出发，我现在就挺看好Dr.{@nickname}。
messages.en: Of course, from my personal perspective, I’m pretty optimistic about Dr.___ already.

messages.zh: 道谢
messages.en: Express thanks

messages.zh: 别那么拘谨，现在我们也算是一起滚过战壕的战友了。
messages.en: Don’t be so formal, we’re comrades who have rolled in the trenches together now.

messages.zh: 闲谈到此为止。我们没更多时间可以浪费。
messages.en: Enough chatting. We don’t have any more time to waste.

messages.zh: 卡西米尔有句谚语：“喘息时死亡就会追上你。”
messages.en: Kazimierz has a saying: “Death will catch up to you when you pant.”

messages.zh: 抱歉。走吧！去把整合运动的封锁线扯成碎片！
messages.en: Apologies. Let’s go! Go tear Reunion Movement’s blockade apart!
